name: my first Godot game (Jeremy M)
description:
This is an RPG prototype that I made over the past 12 days following a tutorial from Benjamin Anderson from HeartBeast.

CONTROLS:

Move: WASD or arrow keys, left joystick or D-pad

Attack: X or K key, ╳ on PS, A on Xbox

Roll: Z or L key, ▢ on PS, X on Xbox

(Please note: when playing in the browser, you must make sure to click the game window for the controls to work)
